Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver

Interface Solver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, SolverBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullSolver, SmtLibSolver, Yices2SmtLibSolver
    public interface Solver
extends SolverBase
    Common interface for SMT solvers. Use the add(Expr) methods to add expressions to the solver. Then use SolverBase.check() method to check their satisfiability. The result can be queried by SolverBase.getStatus(). If the expressions are satisfiable, a satisfying assignment can be obtained by SolverBase.getModel(). The solver can also support incremental solving by SolverBase.push() and SolverBase.pop().
